mainDescription: A great choice to live a stylish experience like no other around Ayr. The perfect venue specialized in slot machines for your leisure. The Admiral’s staff guarantees to spoil you with the best care to serve you exquisite drinks free of charge.
secondaryDescription: An exclusive seat is ready for you anytime to enjoy one of the most exciting venues in Scotland. Don’t miss the opportunity to walk away with one of the many prizes and jackpots its extensive array of slot titles offer.

info.address: 202 High St, Ayr KA7 1RQ, Scotland, United Kingdom.

facilities.title: Food & Drink
content: Enjoy the best modern Scottish drinks with a free welcome sip. Still, the Admiral has no dining options.

facilities.title: Rooftop
content: Just indoors gaming rooms available, the Admiral lacks a rooftop area.

facilities.title: Live Shows
content: Although the Admiral’s staff thrives to serve guests with occasional themed costumes, the venue rarely hosts live entertainment shows and live sporting events screenings.

facilities.title: Business Meetings
content: Furnished only with a great slot machines hall, this venue does not provide private meeting packages.

facilities.title: Loyalty programme
content: The Admiral has no membership or loyalty programme to ensure access for everyone.

info.dressCode: Smart casual is the standard, but many guests opt for a more polished look.
info.ageRestrictions: Strictly 18 and over, in line with UK gambling regulations.

electronicCasinoGames: A wide array of slot machine titles is available at this venue.
